code: export function round(value,precision){var multiplier=Math.pow(10,precision||0);return Math.round(value*multiplier)/multiplier;}export function formatNumber(inputNumber){var ret=inputNumber.toString();var expr=/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g;if(ret.indexOf('.')===-1){ret=ret.replace(expr,',');}else{var split=ret.split('.');var left=split[0].replace(expr,',');var right=split[1];if(right.length===1&&right!=='0'){right+='0';}ret="".concat(left,".").concat(right);}return ret;}export function roundAndFormatNumber(value,precision){var ret='';var rounded=round(value,precision);var formatted=formatNumber(rounded);ret=formatted;return ret;}
